name: Avocadoes
desc: Avocados are creamy, nutrient-rich fruits known for their buttery texture and versatility in culinary dishes.

name: Apples
desc: Apples are crisp and juicy fruits with a wide range of flavors, from tart to sweet, and are rich in fiber and antioxidants.

name: Oranges
desc: Oranges are citrus fruits famous for their tangy flavor and high vitamin C content, making them a refreshing and nutritious snack.

name: Bananas
desc: Bananas are tropical fruits known for their convenient peel-and-eat packaging, providing a quick source of energy and essential nutrients like potassium.

name: Mangoes
desc: Mangoes are tropical stone fruits prized for their sweet, juicy flesh and vibrant colors, adding a tropical flair to both savory and sweet dishes.

name: Strawberries
desc: Strawberries are vibrant red berries with a sweet and slightly tart flavor, packed with vitamins, antioxidants, and dietary fiber.

name: Pineapple
desc: Pineapples are tropical fruits with a refreshing, tangy-sweet taste and are loaded with nutrients like vitamin C and manganese.

name: Watermelon
desc: Watermelons are large, juicy fruits with a crisp texture and a sweet, refreshing flavor, perfect for staying hydrated on hot days.

name: Papayas
desc: Papayas are tropical fruits with a buttery texture and a sweet, musky flavor, known for their abundance of vitamins and digestive enzymes.

name: Red Grapes
desc: Red grapes are sweet and juicy berries commonly used for making wine but are also enjoyed fresh as a healthy snack.

name: Pixies
desc: Pixies are small, seedless citrus fruits with a sweet and tangy flavor, reminiscent of tangerines and mandarins.

name: Peaches
desc: Peaches are soft, fuzzy fruits with a delicate, sweet flavor and are rich in vitamins, minerals, and antioxidants.

name: Green Grapes
desc: Green grapes are crisp and juicy berries with a slightly tart flavor, offering a refreshing burst of sweetness when eaten fresh or added to salads and desserts.

name: Tomatoes
desc: Tomatoes are juicy, vibrant fruits packed with antioxidants, essential for sauces, salads, and sandwiches.

name: Spring Onions
desc: Spring onions offer a mild, onion-like flavor with a subtle sweetness, perfect for garnishing dishes or adding to stir-fries.

name: Red Onions
desc: Red onions provide a bold, pungent taste and vibrant color, ideal for salads, sandwiches, and grilling.

name: White Onions
desc: White onions have a milder flavor compared to their red counterparts, versatile in various cuisines and cooking methods.

name: White Cabbage
desc: White cabbage offers a crunchy texture and subtle sweetness, commonly used in coleslaws, salads, and stir-fries.

name: Sweet Potatoes
desc: Sweet potatoes are nutritious tubers with a naturally sweet flavor, excellent for roasting, mashing, or adding to soups and stews.

name: English Cucumbers
desc: English cucumbers are crisp and refreshing, perfect for salads, sandwiches, or simply enjoyed as a healthy snack.

name: Butternut Pumpkin
desc: Butternut pumpkin features a sweet, nutty taste and smooth texture, ideal for soups, curries, and roasted vegetable dishes.

name: Coriander/Dhania
desc: Coriander provides a fresh, citrusy flavor with hints of spice, widely used in salads, soups, and curries.

name: Green Peppers
desc: Green peppers offer a crisp texture and mildly sweet taste, versatile in stir-fries, salads, and as a colorful addition to dishes.

name: Carrots
desc: Carrots are crunchy, slightly sweet root vegetables rich in vitamins and antioxidants, commonly enjoyed raw, roasted, or cooked in various dishes.

name: Pineapple Juice
desc: Pineapple juice bursts with tropical sweetness, refreshing your palate with its tangy flavor.

name: Strawberry Juice
desc: Strawberry juice offers a delightful blend of sweetness and tartness, evoking the essence of ripe, sun-kissed berries.

name: Passion Juice
desc: Passion fruit juice tantalizes the taste buds with its exotic aroma and vibrant, tangy flavor profile.

name: Watermelon Juice (500ml)
desc: Watermelon juice is a hydrating and refreshing beverage, boasting a subtly sweet and juicy taste.

name: Apple Juice
desc: Apple juice is crisp and flavorful, capturing the essence of freshly picked orchard apples in every sip.

name: Orange Juice
desc: Orange juice is a classic breakfast staple, brimming with tangy citrus flavor and natural vitamin C goodness.

name: Grapefruit Juice
desc: Grapefruit juice delivers a zesty and invigorating citrus experience, with a perfect balance of sweetness and bitterness.

name: Baguette
desc: A classic French bread known for its long and slender shape, with a crispy crust and soft interior, perfect for sandwiches or dipping in olive oil.

name: Wholewheat Bread
desc: A hearty bread made from whole wheat flour, offering a nutty flavor and dense texture, rich in fiber and nutrients, ideal for wholesome sandwiches or toast.

name: Sourdough Bread
desc: A hearty bread made from whole wheat flour, offering a nutty flavor and dense texture, rich in fiber and nutrients, ideal for wholesome sandwiches or toast.

name: Multigrain Bread
desc: A nutritious bread made with a variety of grains and seeds, providing a hearty texture and rich, nutty taste, perfect for adding extra flavor and crunch to sandwiches.

name: Pita Bread
desc: A soft and fluffy Middle Eastern flatbread, ideal for stuffing with falafel, grilled meats, or fresh vegetables, offering a versatile base for a variety of fillings.

name: White Bread
desc: A classic bread made from refined wheat flour, characterized by its soft texture and mild flavor, perfect for making sandwiches, toast, or accompanying soups and salads.

name: Feta (250g)
desc: A tangy and crumbly Greek cheese made from sheep's milk or a blend of sheep's and goat's milk.

name: Mozzarella (200g)
desc: A soft and mild Italian cheese known for its smooth texture and ability to melt beautifully, often used in pizzas and caprese salads.

name: Gouda (200g)
desc: A Dutch cheese with a creamy texture and sweet, nutty flavor, available in various ages ranging from young and mild to aged and sharp.

name: Manchego (100g)
desc: A Spanish cheese made from sheep's milk, featuring a firm texture and nutty flavor with hints of sweetness.

name: Brie (125g)
desc: A French cheese with a soft, creamy interior and a bloomy rind, known for its rich and buttery flavor.

name: Camembert (200g)
desc: Similar to Brie, Camembert is a soft French cheese with a creamy texture and earthy flavor, often enjoyed with crusty bread.

name: Montagnolo (200g)
desc: A creamy blue cheese from Germany, characterized by its velvety texture, rich flavor, and blue veins.

name: Parmesan (200g)
desc: A hard and granular Italian cheese with a sharp and savory taste, commonly grated over pasta dishes or salads.

name: Cheddar (100g)
desc: A versatile cheese originating from England, featuring a smooth texture and sharp flavor that intensifies with age, often used in sandwiches, sauces, and as a topping.

name: Mango Smoothie
desc: A tropical delight bursting with the sweet and tangy flavor of ripe mangoes blended to perfection.

name: Banana Smoothie
desc: Creamy and satisfying, this classic smoothie combines the natural sweetness of bananas with a hint of vanilla.

name: Green Smoothie
desc: Packed with nutritious greens like spinach and kale, this vibrant smoothie is a refreshing way to boost your daily veggie intake.

name: Banana Almond Smoothie
desc: Indulge in a nutty twist on the classic banana smoothie, enhanced with the rich flavor of almonds for a satisfying treat.

name: Papaya Smoothie
desc: Transport yourself to the tropics with this refreshing blend of ripe papaya, coconut water, and a splash of lime for a zesty kick.

name: Strawberry Smoothie
desc: Bursting with the sweetness of fresh strawberries, this smoothie is a delightful way to start your day or satisfy your sweet tooth.

name: Kiwi Smoothie
desc: Refreshing and tangy, this smoothie features the vibrant flavor of kiwi fruit combined with creamy yogurt for a deliciously tart treat.
